Choose user or organization: Choose 'User' if you want to donate or receive blood. Choose 'Organization' if you represent a hospital.

Join the Life Saving Movement. Donate Blood and Make a Difference!
Welcome to Nuqta, Egypt's premier blood donation website! Our platform connects donors with those in need across the country.
we_volunteer_description: We dedicate our time and skills to support blood donation drives and deliver vital aid to those in need.
we_Donate_description: We provide financial support, food supplies, and essential equipment to uplift underprivileged communities.
we_Encourage_description: We inspire others to take action, spread kindness, and support those who are less fortunate.
our_main_services_desc: Allow users to register themselves as blood donors. Collect necessary information such as name, contact details, blood type, and any medical conditions.
our_facilities_desc: Support to those requiring blood transfusions across the country. Explain the steps involved in the donation process, from registration to post-donation refreshments and rest.
be_hero_desc_1: Help us spread the word about the importance of blood donation. Share your donation experience on social media, encourage your friends and family to donate, and be a champion for our cause.
be_hero_desc_2: On behalf of all those whose lives you'll touch with your generosity, we extend our heartfelt gratitude. Together, we can create a healthier, brighter future for our communities.
download_app_desc: Stay constantly connected with those who need you, and help save lives with just one step through our app.
footer_desc: Nuqta is a platform that connects blood donors with those in urgent need. Together, we save lives and build a healthier future.
